choices: Watch the fox do her poledance
Hit the bar and try some of the cow's milk
Get a lapdance from the bootylicious tiger
A special show is about to start onstage
1.content:
"Dude, where are we going?" You ask your best friend, Rob as he makes a right into the seedier part of the city. "Just trust me, man. I got us VIP passes for the awesome club like no other. After tonight, you'll thank me for the unbelievable time you had." After ten more minutes of driving, he finally pulls into a parking space directly in front of an alleyway. "We're here!" He says as he exits the car. You just look at him confusedly. "But this is just an alley."

"No, man, follow me. I promise this will be worth the trip!"

You humor him and follow him into the alley for about twenty feet before you see a door alongside the alley wall. Rob knocks and a panel at the top of the door slides away to reveal two eyes staring back at the two of you. "Password?" Says a gruff voice behind the door.

"Delilah." Says rob, and the door opens, revealing a beefy looking bouncer who Ushers the two of you inside. Behind the door is a long, downwards staircase. Once you reach the bottom, your eyes widen in shock and surprise. Rob had brought you to a stripclub! Except, all the dancers were humanoid animals! You see a tigress with an enormous ass giving a guy a lapdance, and over at the bar was a ridiculously endowed cow, squeezing her breasts to cause them to squirt milk into a pair of glasses , which were quickly downed by two customers. Up on stage was a literal fox in a dominatrix outfit doing a poledance.

You turn to Rob and say "What is this place?" Rob had a satisfied grin across his face. "Welcome to Pamela's Pleasure Palace! The only place on Earth with animatronic exotic dancers!"

"Animatronic?" You say questioningly, glancing towards the dancers once again. "They don't look like robots." "Well, they ain't real furries, either. They're androids! Synthetic flesh and fur over a robotic skeleton. You know, like the Terminator. Anyway, I got us these!" He hands you a good pin shaped like the letters VIP. "Pin that to your shirt, and the dancers here will do anything you want! They'll even let you grope them, if you're so inclined. Now, you go ahead and have a good time, I'll catch up with you later." With that, Rob makes his way to a corner of the club while you can only stand there for several moments in disbelief.

Eventually, you regain your senses and decide that Rob probably went through a lot to plan this, so you pin the VIP to your shirt and get ready for one Hell of a night.
1.title: Night on the Town

choices: Grab yourself a drink at the bar
Take a seat and watch the jaguar dance
Get a private room with the lioness
14.content:
You decided to have a look at the VIP lounge. You walked up to a door that had a bright pink neon sign above it that said "VIP Pouch Lounge". The bouncer, a 6-foot tall man in a black suit held out his arm in front of you. You quickly showed him your VIP pin and he waved you on through. You opened the door to find a set of stairs that led downward, likely into the basement. You followed them for a few flights until you reached the bottom, finding yourself at another door.

You opened the door and found yourself in quite a lavish looking lounge, which was bathed in pink and purple lights. There were comfortable looking couches and chairs spread out all over the room, a series of stages with stripper poles(8 in all), and a large bar counter just to your right. You also found another door on your far left, which led to a series of private rooms. There were a wide range of animatronic anthros here, though several really caught your eye. There was a busty, bright pink female kangaroo at the bar, a lime green furred jaguar doing a pole dance and a purple furred lioness giving a lap dance. The place was a lot to take in, so where do you decide to start?
14.title: VIP Treatment

info.brief_description: You and your friend hit a stripclub of anthro dancers for some late night entertainment.
info.description:
You and your best friend are out for a night on the town together, to celebrate having recently graduated college. Your friend insists that you come with him to a "special club" that he happens to have VIP passes for. Little do you know that this is no ordinary club he's taking you to. It's a stripclub, but not just any strip club, It's Pamela's Pleasure Palace! What sets it apart from other clubs is it's dancers are not human. Technically, they're not even alive, due to the fact that they're Androids! Robotic skeletons covered with synthetic flesh, skin and fur. But wait, there's more!

Some of the dancers have additional features, such as expandable assets and other such things to cater to any client's particular tastes. Needless to say, this is going to be one night you won't soon forget!

Dancers

Viki - A literal vixen with a voluptuous figure. She sports a pair of JJ Cup breasts and a nice, round ass to boot. Specializes as the club's resident dominatrix, often wearing such attire around the club or when on stage. Has a bit of a thing for expansion in her programing, and thus enjoys forcing the other dancers to expand in various ways for the clientele's entertainment.

Big Bessy - A friendly and cheerful cow droid. Her stage name comes from the two enormous, pink milk tanks attached to her chest, which each contain a sort of artificial mammary gland to simulate lactation. Her assets as well as her plucky personality have made her a favorite among regulars of the club. Sometimes she'll go behind the bar and whip up some of her special "Milkshakes" using, you guessed it, her own milk!

"Big Booty" Judy - A tigress with a nice, plump rack. But what really draws attention to her is her rump, with each cheek as big as a beach ball. When it comes to lapdances, she is unsurprisingly the number one most requested dancer at the club.

Feel free to add your own dancers if you so desire.

Rules

1. No super short chapters, unless you're just giving more options.
2. Nothing really gross.
3. I may add or edit rules as needed.

Have fun!
